# Prova immagine 

![foto](man/arca_logo.png)



```{r, echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
x = mean(mtcars$mpg)
```

La media delle mpg è `r x`


```{r echo = F}
data = mtcars
data$y = data$mpg

```


$$\bar{x} = \frac{\sum x_i}{n} =  \frac{`r sum(mtcars$mpg)`}{`r nrow(mtcars)`} $$


$$z_i = \frac{x_i - \bar{x} }{sd} = \frac{`r data$y[1] - mean(data$y)`}{`r sd(data$y)`} = `r (data$y[1] - mean(data$y))/sd(data$y) ` $$

```{r plot-static, echo=FALSE, eval=knitr::is_latex_output()}
library(ggplot2)

       aes(y=peri,x=shape, color =shape, size = peri)) + geom_point() +
```
